EmailTemplate.name: India/SS61.04-05-21 BNK India/SS61 Email 5.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: 3 Remarkable Benefits Of Optimizing Your Cash Cycle
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Did you know that, by optimizing your cash management operations in-branch, you can create significant cost and efficiency savings for your financial institution – as much as 50%? Download our latest ebook to explore true cash optimization and learn how: - Cash automation at your ATMs reduces replenishment cycles - Optimizing cash cycles frees branch staff to deliver focused service - How streamlined cash management positively impacts the underbanked - You can finally see the efficiency and cost savings you need – and more ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
